testcase.name: 01-gst-pulseaudio-plugin
testcase.purpose: Objective: The pulseaudio plugin of GStreamer is available - Description: Inspect the installed capacities of GStreamer and check that it includes a pulseaudio plugin.

description.pre_condition: Objective: The pulseaudio plugin of GStreamer is available - Description: Inspect the installed capacities of GStreamer and check that it includes a pulseaudio plugin.

testcase.name: 02-vaapi-installed
testcase.purpose: Objective: component for video acceleration are used through va-api - Description: use a va-api tool to check that va-api is available

description.pre_condition: Objective: component for video acceleration are used through va-api - Description: use a va-api tool to check that va-api is available

testcase.name: 01-wav-test
testcase.purpose: Objective: test wav sample with gst-launch - Description: check if gst-launch is able to play a wav sound

description.pre_condition: Objective: test wav sample with gst-launch - Description: check if gst-launch is able to play a wav sound
description.test_script_entry: cd /usr/share/tests/common/common-multimedia-suite/TESTDIR/00-common/D0-multimedia/02-audio;export QAPATH="/usr/share/tests/common/common-multimedia-suite/TESTDIR/00-common/D0-multimedia/02-audio:/usr/share/tests/common/common-multimedia-suite/TESTDIR/00-common/D0-multimedia:/usr/share/tests/common/common-multimedia-suite/TESTDIR/00-common:/usr/share/tests/common/common-multimedia-suite/TESTDIR";export PATH="$QAPATH:$PATH";init.sh cigale.wav;runme.sh gst.sh cigale.wav;rc=$?;post.sh cigale.wav;exit $rc
